text: América del Pilar Rodrigo was an Argentinian botanist and explorer. Born in the early 20th century, she received a doctorate in botany from the National University of La Plata, and notably worked to classify genera of the family Malvaceae and other spermatophytes. == References == Category:Botanists active in South America Category:Possibly living people Category:Year of birth missing Category:Place of birth missing Category:National University of La Plata alumni Category:Women botanists Category:Argentine botanists Category:Argentine women scientists
title: América del Pilar Rodrigo
